author: bridge-bot
content:
<adietrichs> If you are then free tomorrow during what would have been the RollCall slot, there is another call that might be interesting to people here:

Barnabe and I are hosting the second instance of our new protocol research calls. Topic will be L1 features for near-term execution scaling. Might be interesting for the EVM-equivalent L2s here, to get a feeling for the latest thinking on the L1 side around scaling-related execution layer changes.

Agenda with links here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1532
